mapper.select: SELECT res.* FROM user_role_relation urr LEFT JOIN role r ON urr.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN role_resource_relation rrr ON r.id = rrr.role_id LEFT JOIN resource res ON res.id = rrr.resource_id WHERE urr.user_id = #{userId};
SELECT DISTINCT urr.user_id FROM resource r LEFT JOIN role_resource_relation rrr ON r.id = rrr.resource_id LEFT JOIN user_role_relation urr ON urr.role_id = rrr.role_id WHERE r.id = #{resourceId};
